description: The blue cheese adds a rich saltiness to these indulgent tartlets.
keywords: Tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Artichoke & Blue Cheese Tartlet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g artichokes, store bought jar and drained
4 small puff pastry, store bought roll into 4 small squares

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Brush the pastry sheets with the beaten egg and bake in the oven for 10 minutes.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and fry the artichokes and tomatoes for 5 minutes.
Add the spinach to the pan and fry for a further 1 minute and then remove the pan from the heat.
Remove the baking tray with the pastry sheets from the oven and place the cooked veg on each of the sheets.
Place the blue cheese on top of the veg and drizzle the olive oil on top. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and add salt and pepper to garnish.
